skills.name: The Ouroboros
skills.description: [SP: 15][CD: 20s] Generates a Time Slow field that moves with the character. The field lasts 6.00s, during the character's basic attacks (including combo and charged attacks) gain 30.0% Crit Rate.

skills.name: Energy Devourer
skills.description: After a one-time consumption of 10, 40, and 70 SP, gain 15%, 30%, or 45% Physical DMG respectively for 8s. This effect cannot stack.
